title: "PPTEK" logo font ID. I really have no idea...
content:
Sunday breakfast in bed with the papers if anyone can spot this one:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823012827im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wp3d982535_5660.png)

I'm not sure it's one face, and it's take a heartbeat to live trace it and clean up, but that's not the _point_. :) I really should know it.

Thanks all,

s

PS AdminTypes: _still_ can't upload me pic... Same server error. :(
author: nert

comments.content:
I initially thought that purely because of the "e" - but it's not...

s
It is. Medium or Bold, I’d say. Horizontally compressed (notice the relative widths of the stem and the bar of the T).
Not if you look at the lower-case "k"...

<cite>Not if you look at the lower-case “k”...</cite>

Depends on the version of [Handel Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823012827/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=handel+gothic&q=Go).  
ITC and Bitstream don't have this k; Linotype, Elsner+Flake and URW do.

\>Puts on the humble hat\<

Thank you; mine's the ITC...

I shall ne'er cast my Doubting Thomas net in here again. :/

s
